sentence.Network_en: Simply dip it in suds rinse and allow it to drip dry.
sentence.Network_cn: 你只要将它浸入肥皂水中,冲洗一下,让它自己滴干即可.

entry.tran: (衣服)很快滴干的,滴干免熨的
entry.def: Drip-dry clothes or sheets are made of a fabric that dries free of creases when it is hung up wet.

means.word_mean: 1. treated so as to be easily or quickly washed and dried and requiring little or no ironing;
2. used of fabrics that do not require ironing;
